Study Title: Icotinib or Whole Brain Irradiation in EGFR-mutant Lung Cancer
Brief Summary: EGFR-TKI is good for the patients with EGFR-mutant non-small cell lung cancer.We design this clinical trail to confirm if the efficacy of Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor(EGFR-TKI )(ICOTINIB) is better than whole brain irradiation for the patient with EGFR-mutant non-small cell lung cancer.
Conditions: Brain Metastasis|Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
Secondary Outcome Measures: progress-free survival (PFS), progress-free survival, up to 16 months|time of controlling brain metastasis symptom, time of controlling brain metastasis symptom, 18months|Response rate of brain metastasis, Response rate of brain metastasis, 12months|Cognitive function, Cognitive function, 18months|overall survival(OS), overall survival(OS), 24months
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Guangdong General Hospital, Guangzhou, Guangdong, 510080, China|Guangdong Lung Cancer Institute, Guangdong General Hospital, Guangdong Academy of Medical Sciences, Guangzhou, Guangdong, 510080, China
